string.value: #p1101002# seems eager to talk to me about something...

#p1101002# told me that being at Level 100 still means I have some training to do. He suggested I learn from the Chief Knights who never stop training. He even told me I may one day be able to acquire a new skill...

#p1101002# told me that being at Level 100 still means I have some training to do. He suggested I learn from the Chief Knights who never stop training. He even told me I may one day be able to acquire a new skill...

#h0#. Have you been slacking off in training since reaching Level 100? We all know how powerful you are, but the training is not complete. Take a look at these Chief Knights. They train day and night, preparing themselves for the possible encounter with the Black Mage.
I suggest you visit other Chief Knights and ask for some words of advice. Who knows? You may be able to learn a #bnew skill#k in the process.
